page.title: 13FOOD IN KENDAL
page.content: There is a wide range of eating places in Kendal.These include{Indian, {Italian,Healthfood}and{English {restaurants.}Also there are small cafes where you can get a cup of coffee or a snack. There are two{Chinese}take-aways and a number of{Fish and Chip}shops. There are more{pubs}to each person in Kendal than in any other town in England.This is because it was the {main staging post}for people going to Scotland before there were cars. Kendal has a wide variety of foods which you can buy.There is a healthfood shop and plenty of large supermarkets.The supermarkets sell convenience foods but fresh meats, fruit and vegetables can also be bought. Kendal is also famous for its Mintcake.
